Operation 'post-createPermit' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is too brief and lacks clarity about what permits are, what restrictions can be defined, what is returned, and the side effect of modifying the contract. Added context about permit purpose, restriction support, return value, and state changes for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Create new permits linked to a recurring contract.
data.current_description: Create permits for a recurring contract, including support for defining restrictions.
data.description_suggestion: Creates new permits linked to a recurring contract with optional restrictions. Permits enable controlled recurring payments with specified limitations. Returns the created permit details including permit reference and any applied restrictions. This operation modifies the recurring contract configuration.
data.reasoning: Original description is too brief and lacks clarity about what permits are, what restrictions can be defined, what is returned, and the side effect of modifying the contract. Added context about permit purpose, restriction support, return value, and state changes for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post-notifyShopper' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is vague about the action being performed. Description lacks clarity about what is returned and the operational context (why this is needed, what happens after). Added context about the regulatory purpose, return value, and issuer responsibility to improve AI agent interpretability and help determine when this operation is appropriate.

data.current_summary: Ask issuer to notify the shopper
data.current_description: Sends a request to the issuer so they can inform the shopper about the upcoming recurring payment. This endpoint is used only for local acquiring in India. For more information, refer to [Recurring card payments in India](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/cards-recurring-india).
data.summary_suggestion: Request issuer notification for recurring payment
data.description_suggestion: Sends a notification request to the card issuer to inform the shopper about an upcoming recurring payment. This operation is specific to local acquiring in India and is used to comply with local payment regulations. Returns confirmation of the notification request submission. The issuer will handle direct communication with the shopper.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about the action being performed. Description lacks clarity about what is returned and the operational context (why this is needed, what happens after). Added context about the regulatory purpose, return value, and issuer responsibility to improve AI agent interpretability and help determine when this operation is appropriate.

message: Operation 'post-scheduleAccountUpdater' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description focuses only on input requirements and lacks clarity about the operation's purpose, what Account Updater does, what is returned, and the asynchronous nature of the operation. Added context about the service purpose, clear input alternatives, return value, and side effects (asynchronous update) for better AI agent understanding and decision-making.

data.current_description:
When making the API call, you can submit either the credit card information, or the recurring detail reference and the shopper reference:
 * If the card information is provided, all the sub-fields for `card` are mandatory.
 * If the recurring detail reference is provided, the fields for `shopperReference` and `selectedRecurringDetailReference` are mandatory.
data.summary_suggestion: Schedule Account Updater for payment details
data.description_suggestion: Schedules the Account Updater service to refresh and validate stored payment details. Accepts either direct card information or a reference to an existing recurring detail. If providing card information, all card sub-fields are required. If using recurring detail reference, shopperReference and selectedRecurringDetailReference are required. Returns confirmation of the scheduled update job. The Account Updater will asynchronously validate and update the payment details.
data.reasoning: Original description focuses only on input requirements and lacks clarity about the operation's purpose, what Account Updater does, what is returned, and the asynchronous nature of the operation. Added context about the service purpose, clear input alternatives, return value, and side effects (asynchronous update) for better AI agent understanding and decision-making.
